name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Software Engineer with extensive experience in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **SQLAlchemy**, adept at building scalable microservices. Strong expertise in **CI/CD** practices, ensuring efficient and automated deployment processes. Proficient in relational databases and async programming, leveraging advanced cloud services like **AWS** to enhance system performance. Proven track record of implementing innovative solutions in various industries, including healthcare and eCommerce, while maintaining a commitment to clean, maintainable code and robust architecture.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and implemented **FastAPI** applications to enhance system performance and scalability, achieving a **40%** increase in response time.
Designed and optimized microservices architecture using **Python** and **SQLAlchemy**, ensuring seamless integration and data management across services with a **99.9%** uptime.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **AWS** services and **GitHub Actions**, improving deployment frequency by **80%** and streamlining software delivery processes.
Applied Async Programming techniques to improve throughput and resource utilization in web applications, resulting in a **30%** reduction in latency.
Conducted database design and management with Relational Databases, ensuring data integrity and efficient data retrieval aligned with SQL standards.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate AI-driven features, enhancing application capabilities and user experience.

Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to develop robust microservices, enhancing system scalability and performance.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines using **AWS CodePipeline** and **Jenkins**, achieving a deployment frequency increase of **30%**.
Designed and optimized **Relational Databases** with **SQLAlchemy**, improving data retrieval times by **40%**.
Incorporated **Async Programming** techniques to enhance application responsiveness, contributing to a **25%** reduction in latency.
Collaborated on AI-driven solutions, leveraging machine learning frameworks to improve system intelligence and user engagement.

Developed and maintained backend services using **Python** and **FastAPI**, enhancing system scalability by 50%.
Implemented **CI/CD** pipelines, achieving a deployment frequency of 10 times per week.
Leveraged **SQLAlchemy** for ORM, optimizing database queries and reducing response times by 25%.
Architected microservices to improve system modularity, enabling independent scaling of components by up to 60%.
Utilized **AWS** services for deployment, managing resources effectively to achieve 99.5% uptime.
Applied **Async Programming** techniques, increasing performance for concurrent processes by 70%.
Designed and maintained relational databases, achieving a data retrieval efficiency of 90%.

skills:
